job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you ready to shape the future of AI at SparkOptimus and our clients? Are you passionate about developing cutting-edge (Gen) AI solutions for clients, building innovative tools, and growing a thriving AI service line? Do you want to work in a dynamic, entrepreneurial, and impact-driven environment? If this excites you, then SparkOptimus is the perfect place to embark on your next challenge!
       What you'll do
       As an AI Developer, you'll play a pivotal role in establishing and growing SparkOptimus' AI service line. This is a unique opportunity to apply your technical expertise to solve complex business problems, build impactful AI solutions, and directly influence the growth of our AI development capabilities. Your responsibilities will include:
          + Client MVP Development : Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions to help clients across industries accelerate their growth using (Gen) AI
          + Internal Tooling : Develop and enhance internal AI tools to empower our consultants and staff with cutting-edge generative AI capabilities, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity
          + Innovation and Thought Leadership : Stay at the forefront of technical (Gen) AI advancements, tracking the latest innovations and emerging trends to shape our AI offerings and serve as a trusted thought leader for clients, guiding them in leveraging cutting-edge tech for transformative impact
          + Collaboration and Strategy : Work closely with consultants, partners, and clients to integrate AI solutions into client strategies and SparkOptimus' internal workflows
       SparkOptimus is committed to fostering your development through personalized coaching, structured learning opportunities, and hands-on experience. This role offers an unparalleled chance to grow alongside a high-performing team and contribute to impactful AI projects.
       Why SparkOptimus?
       SparkOptimus helps organizations unlock the power of disruption. We spark and scale transformational initiatives that improve the lives of consumers and customers using new technology. We are pragmatic, we think like a start-up, and we focus on delivering customer and business value all over the world for organizations like Heineken, Ikea, eBay, Unilever, ING, CarNext and AkzoNobel. Our expertise lies in digital, sustainability, and (Gen) AI, and across these topics we provide tailored strategic consultancy that bridges the gap between vision and execution, ensuring our clients not only conceptualize innovative strategies but also implement them effectively.
       At SparkOptimus, we believe diversity and inclusion are inseparably linked to corporate social responsibility. SparkOptimus provides equal opportunities and treatment for all employees, and strives to make sure every employee feels recognized and at home with us.
       Why you should join us
          + Endless growth, learning and development opportunities within an internationally operating company with purpose
          + The opportunity to share your ideas and put your experience and knowledge into practice
          + Very positive work environment in a young, dynamic, and informal team
          + Supportive and friendly team to help you develop in the role
          + Fuel up with daily delicious and healthy breakfast, lunch and snacks
          + Office in the center of Amsterdam
          + Regular company events and team activities throughout the year
job_details.full_text:
AI Developer

Are you ready to shape the future of AI at SparkOptimus and our clients? Are you passionate about developing cutting-edge (Gen) AI solutions for clients, building innovative tools, and growing a thriving AI service line? Do you want to work in a dynamic, entrepreneurial, and impact-driven environment? If this excites you, then SparkOptimus is the perfect place to embark on your next challenge!
       What you'll do
       As an AI Developer, you'll play a pivotal role in establishing and growing SparkOptimus' AI service line. This is a unique opportunity to apply your technical expertise to solve complex business problems, build impactful AI solutions, and directly influence the growth of our AI development capabilities. Your responsibilities will include:
          + Client MVP Development : Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions to help clients across industries accelerate their growth using (Gen) AI
          + Internal Tooling : Develop and enhance internal AI tools to empower our consultants and staff with cutting-edge generative AI capabilities, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity
          + Innovation and Thought Leadership : Stay at the forefront of technical (Gen) AI advancements, tracking the latest innovations and emerging trends to shape our AI offerings and serve as a trusted thought leader for clients, guiding them in leveraging cutting-edge tech for transformative impact
          + Collaboration and Strategy : Work closely with consultants, partners, and clients to integrate AI solutions into client strategies and SparkOptimus' internal workflows
       SparkOptimus is committed to fostering your development through personalized coaching, structured learning opportunities, and hands-on experience. This role offers an unparalleled chance to grow alongside a high-performing team and contribute to impactful AI projects.
       Why SparkOptimus?
       SparkOptimus helps organizations unlock the power of disruption. We spark and scale transformational initiatives that improve the lives of consumers and customers using new technology. We are pragmatic, we think like a start-up, and we focus on delivering customer and business value all over the world for organizations like Heineken, Ikea, eBay, Unilever, ING, CarNext and AkzoNobel. Our expertise lies in digital, sustainability, and (Gen) AI, and across these topics we provide tailored strategic consultancy that bridges the gap between vision and execution, ensuring our clients not only conceptualize innovative strategies but also implement them effectively.
       At SparkOptimus, we believe diversity and inclusion are inseparably linked to corporate social responsibility. SparkOptimus provides equal opportunities and treatment for all employees, and strives to make sure every employee feels recognized and at home with us.
       Why you should join us
          + Endless growth, learning and development opportunities within an internationally operating company with purpose
          + The opportunity to share your ideas and put your experience and knowledge into practice
          + Very positive work environment in a young, dynamic, and informal team
          + Supportive and friendly team to help you develop in the role
          + Fuel up with daily delicious and healthy breakfast, lunch and snacks
          + Office in the center of Amsterdam
          + Regular company events and team activities throughout the year

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing and deploying generative AI solutions for clients and internal tooling. It highlights building applications around GenAI capabilities, integrating them into client strategies, and staying at the forefront of GenAI advancements, aligning strongly with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.task: Client MVP Development : Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions to help clients across industries accelerate their growth using (Gen) AI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase involves designing, developing, and deploying solutions, which are core software development activities, specifically for AI applications.

job_tasks.task: Internal Tooling : Develop and enhance internal AI tools to empower our consultants and staff with cutting-edge generative AI capabilities, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development and enhancement of tools, which falls under software development, with a focus on AI capabilities.

job_tasks.task: Innovation and Thought Leadership : Stay at the forefront of technical (Gen) AI advancements, tracking the latest innovations and emerging trends to shape our AI offerings and serve as a trusted thought leader for clients, guiding them in leveraging cutting-edge tech for transformative impact
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding advancements and trends to shape offerings and guide clients, indicating a need to align technical capabilities with business strategy and client needs.

job_tasks.task: Collaboration and Strategy : Work closely with consultants, partners, and clients to integrate AI solutions into client strategies and SparkOptimus' internal workflows
job_tasks.justification: This task requires working with various stakeholders to integrate AI solutions into business strategies and workflows, demonstrating business understanding and strategic alignment.
While broad, 'building AI solutions' implies the underlying work of creating and adapting models, especially in the context of GenAI.
The creation of innovative tools often involves leveraging and adapting AI models.

job_tasks.task: growing a thriving AI service line
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on the business aspect of AI, including strategy and growth, rather than just pure technical implementation.

job_tasks.task: apply your technical expertise to solve complex business problems
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the application of technical skills to address business challenges, a key aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.task: directly influence the growth of our AI development capabilities
job_tasks.justification: This points to a strategic role in the business growth of AI capabilities.

job_tasks.task: empower our consultants and staff with cutting-edge generative AI capabilities
job_tasks.justification: This implies the development or implementation of generative AI models to provide capabilities to users.
This describes the business outcome and value proposition of the AI solutions being developed.

job_tasks.task: leveraging cutting-edge tech for transformative impact
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the business impact and strategic use of technology.

job_tasks.task: integrate AI solutions into client strategies
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to understanding client business strategies and embedding AI within them.

job_tasks.task: integrate AI solutions into SparkOptimus' internal workflows
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding internal business processes and integrating AI into them.

job_tasks.task: bridging the gap between vision and execution
job_tasks.justification: This describes a role that connects strategic vision with practical implementation, a core business understanding function.

job_tasks.task: ensuring that clients not only conceptualize innovative strategies but also implement them effectively
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the business-oriented outcome of strategy implementation.
